Package invader.entity

Class Entity

java.lang.Object
javafx.scene.Node
javafx.scene.image.ImageView
invader.MovingObject
invader.entity.Entity
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget
Direct Known Subclasses:
Boss, Enemy, Spaceship
public abstract class Entity
extends MovingObject
Author:
Pierce Forte, Jeff Kim Abstract class that is used to create all types of entities used in this game. Spaceship, boss, enemy, all belongs to this abstract class This class is necessary and efficient because there are many features that the boss, enemy, and spaceship shares The projectile is an abstract method because different entities have different missile types. It has methods like getting lives, setting lives, getting points, seeking out of bounds, etc
